title: I'd like some help..
body:
Hi,   Riot games
My name is sabercath2 and im playing the league of legends game i'd like a skin from you. I want to get money in this game but i cant so i want you help to get a skin in zed. Zed is my favorite champion and i want to have a skin, so please if you can please sent me a skin in zed. I want to have an answer from you Î™ appreciate that you read my message.

with love, 
                   sabercath2

replies.body: Unfortunately, we can't gift out specific content for free.  We do have some [free swag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-) though that you can claim like Facebook Tristana and Dreadnight Garen.  Hope that helps!
so can you help for giving me something because i need it plz you re riot games so plz

Don't act all typical EUNE now - he just sent you a link to where and how you can get some free skins (for Alistar, Garen and Tristana).
Read it, and take what you want. Or grind for free Hextech chests.
